pullRequest.title: BLUEBUTTON-1948 PartD cursor paging
pullRequest.bodyText:
Motivation
The part-d contract search end-point is effectively broken for part-d contracts that have a large result set. The root cause was determined to be caused by requests timing out. The code was profiled and counting the result set was a large portion of the request time. After a meeting, the consensus is to move to a cursor-based paging algorithm.
Changes
Implemented a cursor-based paging algorithm for the searchByContract end-point. Other end-point still use offset-based paging, but could be converted to cursor-based paging in a future PR.

Setup the project to have different paging algorithms.
Added a new PatientLinkBuilder class. Created a new interface LinkBuilder to capture common aspects of link builders.
PagingLinkBuilder was renamed OffsetLinkBuilder and made to implement the LinkBuilder interface.
Worked around a HAPI bug that added a total to the bundle resource when none was set.

Reviewers

Look for forgotten corner cases

Security Aspects
N/A

commit.message:
PatientLinkBuilder

- No paging support
- All tests passing

Fix total

- Work around HAPI 1985 issue
- Add QueryLogListener
Added an operation to seach by coverage contract

nodes.bodyText: Renamed PageLinkBuilder but otherwise, it works the same as before.
I'm initializing with a string vs RequestDetail because it makes it easier to test the class.
This has been rearranged for clarity.
For readability, I'm trying make this code follow SQL somewhat. b is used as a table alias would be used in a SQL statement.
No total value when paging is requested.
